deity_markdown: [Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=329), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Emmeton Galardaria](/Deities.aspx?ID=341), [Erecura](/Deities.aspx?ID=564), [Grundinnar](/Deities.aspx?ID=514), [Irez](/Deities.aspx?ID=472), [Magdh](/Deities.aspx?ID=457), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=460), [The Freeing Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=231), [The Readied Strike](/Deities.aspx?ID=371), [The Spirit Wall](/Deities.aspx?ID=363), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256), [Varg](/Deities.aspx?ID=561)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=2343)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=132" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 256

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=329), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Emmeton Galardaria](/Deities.aspx?ID=341), [Erecura](/Deities.aspx?ID=564), [Grundinnar](/Deities.aspx?ID=514), [Irez](/Deities.aspx?ID=472), [Magdh](/Deities.aspx?ID=457), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=460), [The Freeing Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=231), [The Readied Strike](/Deities.aspx?ID=371), [The Spirit Wall](/Deities.aspx?ID=363), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256), [Varg](/Deities.aspx?ID=561)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You grant the target brief foresight. The target gains a +1 status bonus to its next [initiative](/Rules.aspx?ID=3300) roll, after which the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7th rank.
name: Anticipate Peril
